onSearchQueryChange(java.lang.String).Description: Method invoked when the search bar detects a change in the query.

Parameters: String: The query set in the search bar at the time the IME is being dismissed.
onKeyboardDismiss(java.lang.String).Description: Method invoked when the IME is being dismissed.

onSearchQuerySubmit(java.lang.String).Description: Method invoked when the search query is submitted. This method can be called without a preceeding onSearchQueryChange, in particular in the case of a voice input.

ClassDesc: Interface for receiving notification of search query changes.
